column1: I’m not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That’s my nindo: my ninja way!
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win!
When you have to save someone, you can't think about the consequences.
I am Justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I'm the one who will become the god of a new world that everyone desires!
I don’t want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean… is the King of the Pirates!
